title: My Hero Academia Season 1
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 1 Boku no Hero Academia 僕のヒーローアカデミア MHA Season 1 Boku no Hero Academia S1
description: In a world where 80% of humanity possesses 'Quirks,' Izuku Midoriya is born powerless but gains a chance to become a hero after a fated meeting with All Might.

title: My Hero Academia Season 2
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 2nd Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 2 Boku no Hero Academia 2nd Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 2nd Season MHA Season 2
description: The UA students compete in the world-renowned Sports Festival. Later, Deku, Iida, and Todoroki face off against the fearsome Hero Killer: Stain.

title: My Hero Academia Season 3
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 3rd Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 3 Boku no Hero Academia 3rd Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 3rd Season MHA Season 3
description: During a summer training camp, the League of Villains launches a surprise attack. This leads to the historic final battle between All Might and All For One.

title: My Hero Academia Season 4
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 4th Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 4 Boku no Hero Academia 4th Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 4th Season MHA Season 4
description: Deku takes on an internship with Sir Nighteye and joins a mission to rescue a young girl named Eri from the Yakuza leader, Overhaul.

title: My Hero Academia Season 5
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 5th Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 5 Boku no Hero Academia 5th Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 5th Season MHA Season 5
description: Class 1-A and Class 1-B battle in a joint training exercise. Meanwhile, the League of Villains faces off against the Meta Liberation Army.

title: My Hero Academia Season 6
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 6th Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 6 Boku no Hero Academia 6th Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 6th Season MHA Season 6
description: The Paranormal Liberation War begins. Heroes and Villains engage in an all-out war that will change hero society forever.

title: My Hero Academia Season 7
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 7th Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 7 Boku no Hero Academia 7th Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 7th Season MHA Season 7
description: The final war between Heroes and Villains begins as Star and Stripe arrives from the USA to face Shigaraki.

title: My Hero Academia Final Season
originalTitle: Boku no Hero Academia Final Season
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア FINAL SEASON
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Final Season Boku no Hero Academia Final Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア FINAL SEASON MHA Final Season
description: The appearance of 'quirks,' newly discovered superpowers, has been steadily increasing over the years, with 80 percent of humanity possessing various abilities from manipulation of elements to shapeshifting. This leaves the remainder of the world completely powerless, and Izuku Midoriya is one such individual.

title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps
searchableTitle: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Fantastic Four 2025 FF 2025
description: Marvel's First Family enters the MCU. Set in a retro-futuristic 1960s, the team must balance their new powers with a cosmic threat that could destroy the universe.

title: Jurassic World Rebirth
searchableTitle: Jurassic World Rebirth Jurassic World 4 JW Rebirth
description: A new era of the Jurassic franchise begins. Five years after the events of Dominion, a specialized team races to secure DNA samples from the world's most dangerous dinosaurs before they fall into the wrong hands.

title: Voldemort: Origins of the Heir
searchableTitle: Voldemort: Origins of the Heir Harry Potter Prequel Tom Riddle Origins
description: While initially a fan project, HBO's upcoming Harry Potter reboot series has sparked renewed interest in the origins of Tom Riddle. This entry tracks the anticipated 2026 window for the Wizarding World's return with a focus on young Tom Riddle's transformation into Lord Voldemort.

title: Superman
searchableTitle: Superman Superman: Legacy Superman (2025)
description: Directed by James Gunn, this film follows Clark Kent as he reconciles his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing in Smallville, Kansas. He is the embodiment of truth, justice, and a better tomorrow in a world that views kindness as old-fashioned.

title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part Two
originalTitle: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part Two
searchableTitle: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part Two Mission: Impossible 8 MI8
description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet to track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity before it falls into the wrong hands.

episodes.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part Two

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
originalTitle: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
searchableTitle: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish Puss in Boots 2 The Last Wish
description: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: he has burned through eight of his nine lives. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.

episodes.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish

title: Top Gun: Maverick
searchableTitle: Top Gun: Maverick Top Gun 2 Top Gun Maverick
description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

title: Attack on Titan
japaneseTitle: 進撃の巨人
searchableTitle: Attack on Titan Shingeki no Kyojin 進撃の巨人 AOT The Advancing Giant SnK
description: Centuries ago, mankind was slaughtered to near extinction by monstrous humanoid creatures called Titans. Humanity survives within three massive walls. After a Colossal Titan breaches the outer wall, young Eren Jaeger vows to exterminate every Titan.

episodes.title: To You, in 2000 Years: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 1
episodes.description: Eren Yeager lives in the town of Shiganshina, located within the outermost of three circular walls protecting humanity from Titans.

episodes.title: That Day: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 2
episodes.description: Eren watches in horror as his mother is eaten by a Titan. He vows to kill all Titans.

episodes.title: A Dim Light Amid Despair: Humanity's Comeback, Part 1
episodes.description: Five years after the fall of Wall Maria, Eren, Mikasa, and Armin graduate from the Training Corps.

episodes.title: The Night of the Closing Ceremony: Humanity's Comeback, Part 2
episodes.description: During the 104th Training Corps graduation, the Colossal Titan reappears, breaching Wall Rose.

episodes.title: First Battle: The Struggle for Trost, Part 1
episodes.description: Eren and his comrades fight for their lives in the Trost District as Titans flood the city.

episodes.title: The World the Girl Saw: The Struggle for Trost, Part 2
episodes.description: As the battle intensifies, the Survey Corps arrives to reinforce the cadets.

episodes.title: Small Blade: The Struggle for Trost, Part 3
episodes.description: Eren awakens his Titan powers for the first time, shocking his comrades.

episodes.title: I Can Hear His Heartbeat: The Struggle for Trost, Part 4
episodes.description: Eren carries a boulder to seal the hole in Wall Rose while under attack from Titans.

episodes.title: Whereabouts of His Left Arm: The Struggle for Trost, Part 5
episodes.description: Eren faces a military tribunal to determine his fate after revealing his Titan powers.

episodes.title: Response: The Struggle for Trost, Part 6
episodes.description: The 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls begins as the Survey Corps heads outside to investigate Titan territory.

episodes.title: Idol: The Struggle for Trost, Part 7
episodes.description: The expedition encounters an Abnormal Titan that walks on two legs and massacres soldiers.

episodes.title: Wound: The Struggle for Trost, Part 8
episodes.description: The Female Titan appears and engages in a devastating battle with Eren's Titan form.

title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
originalTitle: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen

description: Tanjiro, Nezuko, Zenitsu, and Inosuke board the Mugen Train to assist the Flame Hashira, Kyojuro Rengoku, in investigating a series of disappearances.

episodes.title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
episodes.description: The Demon Slayer Corps faces Enmu, Lower Rank One of the Twelve Kizuki, aboard a mysterious train where passengers are falling into eternal sleep.

title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train Arc (TV Version)
japaneseTitle: 鬼滅の刃 無限列車編

description: The TV version of the Mugen Train movie, expanded with additional scenes and an original first episode focusing on Rengoku's mission.

episodes.title: Flame Hashira Kyojuro Rengoku
episodes.description: A special episode focusing on Rengoku's mission before boarding the Mugen Train, with additional character development.

title: Demon Slayer: Entertainment District Arc
japaneseTitle: 鬼滅の刃 遊郭編

description: Tanjiro, Zenitsu, and Inosuke join the Sound Hashira, Tengen Uzui, on a mission to an entertainment district where women have been disappearing.

episodes.title: Sound Hashira Tengen Uzui
episodes.description: Tengen Uzui recruits Tanjiro, Zenitsu, and Inosuke for a mission in the Entertainment District to investigate demon activity.

episodes.title: Infiltration
episodes.description: The Demon Slayers go undercover in the Entertainment District to gather information about the disappearances.

title: Demon Slayer: Swordsmith Village Arc
originalTitle: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Katanakaji no Sato-hen
japaneseTitle: 鬼滅の刃 刀鍛冶の里編
searchableTitle: Demon Slayer: Swordsmith Village Arc Kimetsu no Yaiba: Katanakaji no Sato-hen 鬼滅の刃 刀鍛冶の里編 Season 3 Swordsmith Village
description: Tanjiro travels to the hidden Swordsmith Village to repair his broken sword, where he encounters the Love Hashira and Mist Hashira while facing Upper Rank demons.

episodes.title: Someone's Dream
episodes.description: Tanjiro arrives at the Swordsmith Village and meets the Love Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji and Mist Hashira Muichiro Tokito.

episodes.title: Yoriichi Type Zero
episodes.description: Tanjiro discovers an ancient training doll with six arms, leading to revelations about Sun Breathing techniques.

title: Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc
japaneseTitle: 鬼滅の刃 柱稽古編
searchableTitle: Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc Kimetsu no Yaiba: Hashira Geiko-hen 鬼滅の刃 柱稽古編 Season 4 Hashira Training
description: Following the intense battle in the Swordsmith Village, the Demon Slayer Corps undergoes rigorous training with the Hashira to prepare for the final confrontation with Muzan Kibutsuji.

episodes.title: To Defeat Muzan Kibutsuji
episodes.description: Tanjiro begins his training with the Stone Hashira, Gyomei Himejima, as all Demon Slayers prepare for the final battle.

episodes.title: Love Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji
episodes.description: Tanjiro trains with the Love Hashira to improve his flexibility and agility for the upcoming battles.

title: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc
japaneseTitle: 劇場版 チェンソーマン レゼ篇
searchableTitle: Chainsaw Man Reze Arc Movie 劇場版 チェンソーマン レゼ篇 Bomb Girl
description: A direct sequel to the first season covering the 'Bomb Girl' arc. Denji's life is upended when he meets Reze, a mysterious girl who works at a café, unaware that she is the Bomb Devil, a Soviet hybrid sent to steal his heart[citation:1][citation:4].

episodes.title: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc
episodes.description: Denji falls for the enigmatic Reze, not knowing she is a lethal hybrid assassin. Their relationship triggers a catastrophic battle involving the Typhoon Devil and forces Denji to question trust and desire[citation:1].

description: In a town where the delinquent-heavy Chidori High and the elite Kikyo Girls' High are bitter rivals, Rintaro Tsumugi, a misunderstood student with a fierce face but a gentle heart, meets Kaoruko Waguri. As they grow closer, they must navigate the deep-seated prejudices and social barriers between their two schools.

title: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
originalTitle: Tokidoki Bosotto Russia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san
japaneseTitle: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん
searchableTitle: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian Tokidoki Bosotto Russia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san Roshidere
description: Alisa Mikhailovna Kujou, known as Alya, is the beautiful and talented 'Ice Princess' of Seirei Academy. She often scolds her deskmate Masachika Kuze, but secretly flirts with him in Russian, believing he doesn't understand. Unbeknownst to her, Masachika is actually fluent in Russian and understands every word of her affectionate confessions.

episodes.title: Alya Hides Her Feelings in Russian
A Kiss of the Indirect Variety
Rom-commy With a Chance of Hypnosis

title: Noor
japaneseTitle: ヌール
searchableTitle: Noor 2025 Arifin Shuvoo Jannatul Ferdous Oishee Raihan Rafi Bioscope+
description: Noor falls deeply in love with Shuili, but his intense devotion slowly turns into an unhealthy obsession. As his temper and insecurities grow, their once beautiful marriage begins to unravel. When Shuili leaves, Noor's life spirals out of control, leading him to a path of redemption and confronting memories of a love that nearly destroyed them both.

title: Call of the Night
japaneseTitle: よふかしのうた
searchableTitle: Call of the Night Season 1 Yofukashi no Uta 2022 Ko Yamori Nazuna Nanakusa
description: Ko Yamori, a middle schooler suffering from insomnia, wanders the city streets at night. His life changes when he meets Nazuna Nanakusa, a flirtatious vampire who shows him the freedom of the night. To become a vampire himself, Ko must fall in love with her, beginning a nocturnal journey of self-discovery.

episodes.title: It's Not the Summer Without Night Swimming
Don't You Want to Fall in Love?
Whatever You Do, Don't Stop Me

title: Call of the Night Season 2
japaneseTitle: よふかしのうた 第2期
synonyms: Call of the Night: Cigarette Case Arc
searchableTitle: Call of the Night Season 2 Yofukashi no Uta 2025 Anko Uguisu Detective
description: Picking up after the events of the first season, Ko's resolve to fall in love with Nazuna is tested as a mysterious detective, Anko Uguisu, begins hunting vampires. The season delves into the dark history of vampires and Nazuna's forgotten human past, culminating in the 'Cigarette Case' arc.
